name: Blossom: Escape From Muzag
description:
The tyrant dragon Muzag: Devourer of All has come to magic forest to destroy the sacred cherry blossom tree that keeps the magic forest alive. As long as a part of the tree survives it can regrow elsewhere. Muzag has destroyed all of the tree except one final blossom. You are a wind spirit who has taken it upon themselves to protect the final blossom so that the sacred tree can regrow. Can you escape Muzag?

Please post screenshots of your high scores to add to the fun.

Everything for this game was created in under 10 days.

Joshua Hall (Youtube: cheesemcpuff ) - Lead Programmer.

Ayo Animashaun (Instagram: @ct_dash_9904)  - Programmer.

Medea Berman (Instagram: @w.ytchy) - Art.

Fionn Ruigrok (Instagram: @DopePhooka) - Music/Sound Design.
